import Table from 'react-bootstrap/Table'; function TableDaily(props) { return ( {props.groupedOrders.map((order) => ( ))} {/* Total row */}
DocNum Cartons SKIDS Weight Part Status U_SIF_ShipInst1 U_SIF_ShipInst2
{order.DocNum} {order.Cartons} {order.DocNum} onEditableChange('Cartons', e.target.innerText)}> {order.Cartons} onEditableChange('SKIDS', e.target.innerText)}> {order.SKIDS} onEditableChange('Weight', e.target.innerText)}> {order.Weight} onEditableChange('PART', e.target.innerText)}> {order.PART} {order['Picklist Status'] || "Not Allocated"} {order.U_SIF_ShipInst1} {order.U_SIF_ShipInst2}
Total {props.groupedOrders.reduce((total, order) => total + order.Cartons, 0)} {props.groupedOrders.reduce((total, order) => total + order.SKIDS, 0)} {props.groupedOrders.reduce((total, order) => total + order.Weight, 0)} CARRIER: {props.groupedOrders[0].CARRIER}
); } export default TableDaily;
